messages.content: Despite all the talk of elections the Government have kept on working. Working through all the sound bites, scare tactics and spin to rescue us from the world recession and banking collapse.

Yes, many of us feared for our homes, our savings, our pensions or our jobs over the last eighteen months. The world economy has been in serious trouble. But who would you rather lead us out of this? Someone who is an acknowledged leader across the world or a Tory Party that brought you over three million unemployed and record inflation?
Not all of us prefer style and gloss to a clear focus backed by hard work.
I believe our future is too important to gamble!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keep Garendon and Limehurst Schools open.
Grow strong whilst protecting the countryside.
Bringing new jobs in a competitive world.
A better life in later years, with a National Care Service.

issues.economy: Acknowledged leader across the world or a Tory Party that brought you over three million unemployed and record inflation?
issues.education: Keep Garendon and Limehurst Schools open.
issues.environment: Homes for families to grow strong whilst protecting the countryside.
